Email.subject: I want you to climb into the cannon
Email.content:
Hi $name,
Let's get to the point, quick. I want you to put gunpowder in that cannon, climb inside, and set it off.
Why? Because I believe it will shoot you all the way to the moon.
Think about it. How bad could it be? You'll just need to get some gunpowder- try asking around for that. The guy who watches the cannon might know something.
The Mayor
